com.beaglebuddy.mp3.enums
Class Price

java.lang.Object
  com.beaglebuddy.mp3.enums.Price

public class Price
extends java.lang.Object
A price is comprised of an ISO-4217 currency code and an amount. The amount uses the "." character as the decimal point.

Constructor Summary
Price()
          default constructor using default values of USD and 0.00 for the currency and amount, respectively.

          constructor.
